term.title: ceramer

item.text: Chemically bonded hybrid material which is a crosslinked organic–inorganic polymer.

notes.item: Ceramers are usually prepared by sol-gel processing of oligomers or polymers with reactive silyloxy substituents.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 1801. 'Definitions of terms relating to the structure and processing of sols, gels, networks, and inorganic-organic hybrid materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2007)' on page 1810 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779101801)
